遷.definition: to move; to shift; to change (a position or location etc); to promote

遷安.definition: Qian'an, county-level city in Tangshan 唐山[Tang2 shan1], Hebei

遷安市.definition: Qian'an, county-level city in Tangshan 唐山[Tang2 shan1], Hebei

遷就.definition: to yield to; to adapt to; to accommodate oneself to (sth)

遷居.definition: to move (from one residence to another)

遷怒.definition: to take one's anger out on sb (who does not deserve it)

遷怒於人.definition: to vent one's anger on an innocent party (idiom)

遷西.definition: Qianxi county in Tangshan 唐山[Tang2 shan1], Hebei

遷西縣.definition: Qianxi county in Tangshan 唐山[Tang2 shan1], Hebei

遷離.definition: to move away; to change residence
